about_the_game:
Dynamic Combat and Enemy Variety


Engage in intense combat encounters with a wide range of enemies, each with its own distinct behaviors and attack patterns. Utilize an arsenal of different weapons to adapt to various combat situations and unleash devastating combos on your foes.

Randomized Gameplay


Prepare for unpredictable and thrilling gameplay with randomized elements. Enemies spawn with random weapons, and their locations vary, ensuring that each playthrough offers a fresh and unique challenge. No two encounters will be the same.



Choice-Driven Cyberpunk Story


Immerse yourself in a deep and engaging cyberpunk narrative filled with over 40,000 words of rich storytelling. Your decisions and dialogue choices throughout the game have real consequences, leading to 30 different game endings. Shape the story and discover the true extent of your influence.

Voiceover and Secrets


Experience the game's captivating world through its expertly crafted voice acting, which adds depth and authenticity to every character and dialogue, with nearly 3.5 hours of dialogue fully voiced. Discover secret pickups in each level that unlock additional dialogue branches, adding layers of depth to the intriguing plot.

Dozen Unique Levels


Explore a variety of meticulously crafted levels, each with its distinct challenges, environments, and secrets waiting to be uncovered. From neon-lit cityscapes to shadowy back alleys, the diverse settings will keep you engaged from start to finish.

2.5D Sidescroller with Depth Aiming


Experience a fresh take on the classic sidescroller genre with our unique mechanic. Navigate the multi-layered environments and take down enemies with precision and strategy, adding depth and complexity to the fast-paced combat.

Cyberpunk Style and Synthwave Music


Immerse yourself in a visually stunning cyberpunk world brought to life by Unreal Engine. The stylish aesthetics are complemented by an electrifying synth-wave soundtrack that sets the mood for your epic adventure.

Regular Updates and Future Support


We are committed to providing ongoing support and updates for the game. Expect new features such as language support, gamepad compatibility, and more in the future to enhance your gameplay experience.



Wishlist, Follow...

short_description: Big Byz Wars is a sci-fi 2.5D side-scroller set in a mysterious future where flying cities provide refuge.As a mercenary, defend the largest flying city, Byzantium, facing fierce enemies.With cool graphics & immersive gameplay.The game takes you on an action-packed journey through a dangerous world.
